Silver School of Social Work Master of Social Work
Silver School of Social Work Master of Social Work

Overview of the Master of Social Work at the Silver School, covering degree pathways, curriculum, course descriptions, non-matriculated and online options, study abroad options, and application information. The degree pathways include course sequences for part-time and full-time options for the Master's program, as well as dual degree options. The curriculum consists of a Generalist Practice level followed by a Specialized Practice level and course descriptions in these practices.
